description: This file defines a React component named HeatmapGrid that renders a heatmap visualization of habit completion over a specified number of days. It processes check-in data, maps completion rates to intensity levels, and structures the data into a grid suitable for visual display with accessibility features.

methods.name: levelForRate
methods.description: Maps a completion rate to an intensity level between 0 and 4.

methods.name: HeatmapGrid({ checkins, totalHabits, days = 84 })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a heatmap grid based on check-in data, total habits, and days parameter.

ctags.name: HeatmapGrid
ctags.pattern: /^export default function HeatmapGrid({ checkins, totalHabits, days = 84 }) {$/
